jokes.title: The Chicken and the Road
jokes.body: Why did the chicken cross the road?
jokes.punchline: To get to the other side!

jokes.title: Light Bulb
jokes.body:
How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb?
Other words.

jokes.title: Time Flies
jokes.body: Time flies like an arrow, fruit flies like a banana.

jokes.title: Math Problem
jokes.body: Why was the equal sign so humble?
jokes.punchline: Because it knew it wasn't less than or greater than anyone else.

jokes.title: The Dentist
jokes.body: What did the dentist say to the golfer?
jokes.punchline: You have a hole in one.
